languages.text:
Вам не хватает металлолома, чтобы починить корабль, но вы все еще можете провести ремонт — для этого необходимо пожертвовать улучшением корабля.
Через сервисное меню {console_bind|RightBottom} перейдите в меню управления кораблем и выберите компонент, уровень которого можно уменьшить. Нажмите {console_bind|Confirm} и выберите "Разобрать" — компонент будет частично разобран на детали, которые отправятся в металлолом, а вы сможете починить корабль.

You do not have enough readily available {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades.
Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and choose a component. Press {console_bind|Confirm} and select Downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.
languages.original_text:
Вам не хватает металлолома, чтобы починить корабль, но вы все еще можете провести ремонт — для этого необходимо пожертвовать улучшением корабля.
Через сервисное меню {console_bind|RightBottom} перейдите в меню управления кораблем и выберите компонент, уровень которого можно уменьшить. Нажмите {console_bind|Confirm} и выберите "Разобрать" — компонент будет частично разобран на детали, которые отправятся в металлолом, а вы сможете починить корабль.

traits.locale_text:
You do not have enough readily available scrap to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades.
Open the voidship management screen from the service menu {console_bind|RightBottom} and choose which component's rank would be acceptable to reduce. Press {console_bind|Confirm} and select Downgrade. The enhancement will be stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

You do not have enough readily available scrap to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades.
Open the voidship management screen from the service menu {console_bind|RightBottom} and choose which component's rank would be acceptable to reduce. Press {console_bind|Confirm} and select Downgrade. The enhancement will be stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

You do not have enough readily available scrap to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades.
Open the voidship management screen from quick-access {console_bind|RightBottom} and choose a component. Press {console_bind|Confirm} and select Downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

You do not have enough readily available {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades.
Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and choose a component. Press {console_bind|Confirm} and select Downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

You do not have enough readily available {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades.
Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and choose a component. Press {console_bind|Confirm} and select Downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

languages.text:
No tienes suficiente {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}chatarra{/g} para reparar la nave, pero tienes otras opciones si no te importa sacrificar algunas mejoras de la nave.
Abre la ventana de gestión de la nave del vacío desde el acceso rápido {console_bind|RightBottom} y selecciona un componente. Pulsa {console_bind|Confirm} y selecciona Desmontar. El nivel del componente actual se reducirá al arrancarlo de la nave y convertirlo en chatarra (recuperas parte de lo invertido) con la que reparar la nave.
languages.original_text:
You do not have enough readily available {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades.
Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and choose a component. Press {console_bind|Confirm} and select Downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

traits.locale_text:

El nivel del componente actual se reducirá al arrancarlo de la nave y convertirlo en chatarra (recuperas parte de lo invertido) con la que reparar la nave.

languages.text:
船を修理するのに十分な量の{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}スクラップ{/g}はないが、船のアップグレードを犠牲にする覚悟があるなら、まだ選択肢はある。
クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}からヴォイドシップ管理画面を開き、部品を選択する。{console_bind|Confirm}を押してダウングレードを選択する。部品は船からはがされ予備のスクラップに変わると、レベルが下がる。これを使って船の修理をすることができる。
languages.original_text:
You do not have enough readily available {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades.
Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and choose a component. Press {console_bind|Confirm} and select Downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

traits.locale_text:
船を修理するのに十分な量の{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}スクラップ{/g}はないが、船のアップグレードを犠牲にする覚悟があるなら、まだ選択肢はある。
クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}からヴォイドシップ管理画面を開き、部品を選択する。{console_bind|Confirm}を押してダウングレードを選択する。部品は船からはがされ予備のスクラップに変わると、レベルが下がる。これを使って船の修理をすることができる。

languages.text:
目前，您并没有足够{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}废料{/g}来修理舰船。不过，如果您愿意牺牲舰船的部分升级功能的话，就有足够的资源修理舰船了。
按下{console_bind|RightBottom}打开快速访问菜单，进入虚空舰管理界面，选择任意组件。按下{console_bind|Confirm}，选择降级。在这之后，该组件的当前等级便会降低。该组件会从舰船上拆卸下来，变成废料的一部分，您可以用这些废料来修理舰船。
languages.original_text:
You do not have enough readily available {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades.
Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and choose a component. Press {console_bind|Confirm} and select Downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

traits.locale_text:
目前，您并没有足够{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}废料{/g}来修理舰船。不过，如果您愿意牺牲舰船的部分升级功能的话，就有足够的资源修理舰船了。
按下{console_bind|RightBottom}打开快速访问菜单，进入虚空舰管理界面，选择任意组件。按下{console_bind|Confirm}，选择降级。在这之后，该组件的当前等级便会降低。该组件会从舰船上拆卸下来，变成废料的一部分，您可以用这些废料来修理舰船。

languages.text:
Du hast nicht genug verfügbaren {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}Schrott{/g}, um dein Schiff zu reparieren, aber du hast immer noch Optionen, wenn du bereit bist, einige der Upgrades deines Schiffes zu opfern.
Öffne den Raumschiffverwaltungs-Bildschirm über den Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom} und wähle eine Komponente. Drücke {console_bind|Confirm} und wähle Downgrade. Die aktuelle Stufe der Komponente wird gesenkt, während sie aus dem Schiff entfernt und in zusätzlichen Schrott – einen Teil der ursprünglichen Investition – umgewandelt wird, der zur Reparatur deines Schiffes verwendet werden kann.
languages.original_text:
You do not have enough readily available {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades.
Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and choose a component. Press {console_bind|Confirm} and select Downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

traits.locale_text:

Öffne den Raumschiffverwaltungs-Bildschirm über den Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom} und wähle eine Komponente. Drücke {console_bind|Confirm} und wähle Downgrade. Die aktuelle Stufe der Komponente wird gesenkt, während sie aus dem Schiff entfernt und in zusätzlichen Schrott – einen Teil der ursprünglichen Investition – umgewandelt wird, der zur Reparatur deines Schiffes verwendet werden kann.

languages.text:
Vous n'avez pas assez de {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}pièces de récupération{/g} pour réparer votre vaisseau, mais vous disposez de plusieurs options si vous acceptez de sacrifier quelques améliorations.
Ouvrez l'écran de gestion du vaisseau spatial via l'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom} et choisissez un composant. Appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm} et sélectionnez Rétrograder. Le niveau actuel du composant sera abaissé au fur et à mesure qu'il sera retiré du vaisseau et transformé en pièces de récupération (une partie de l'investissement initial) pour permettre la réparation de votre appareil.
languages.original_text:
You do not have enough readily available {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades.
Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and choose a component. Press {console_bind|Confirm} and select Downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

traits.locale_text:
Vous n'avez pas assez de {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}pièces de récupération{/g} pour réparer votre vaisseau, mais disposez de plusieurs options si vous êtes prêt à sacrifier quelques améliorations de votre vaisseau.
Ouvrez l'écran de gestion du vaisseau à partir de l'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom} et choisissez un composant. Appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm} et sélectionnez Rétrograder. Le niveau actuel du composant sera abaissé au fur et à mesure qu'il sera retiré du vaisseau et transformé pièces de récupération (une partie de l'investissement initial) pour permettre la réparation de votre vaisseau.

Vous n'avez pas assez de {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}pièces de récupération{/g} pour réparer votre vaisseau, mais disposez de plusieurs options si vous êtes prêt à sacrifier quelques améliorations de votre vaisseau.
Ouvrez l'écran de gestion du vaisseau à partir de l'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom} et choisissez un composant. Appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm} et sélectionnez Rétrograder. Le niveau actuel du composant sera abaissé au fur et à mesure qu'il sera retiré du vaisseau et transformé pièces de récupération (une partie de l'investissement initial) pour permettre la réparation de votre vaisseau.

languages.text:
Gemini onarabilmen için hazırda yeterince {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}hurdan{/g} bulunmuyor ancak geminin terfi ettirdiğin bazı kısımlarını feda etmeye göze aldıysan hâlâ seçeneğin mevcut.
Hızlı erişimden {console_bind|RightBottom} uçsuz gemisi yönetimi ekranını aç ve bir bileşen seç. {console_bind|Confirm} düğmesine bas ve Terfiyi Sök komutunu seç. Bileşen, gemiden sökülürken mevcut seviyesi düşecek ve gemini onarmakta kullanabileceğin yedek hurdaya (terfide kullandığın hurdanın yalnızca belirli bir kısmı) dönüşecektir.
